title: 98/284/EC: Commission Decision of 8 April 1998 amending Decision 87/293/EEC authorising methods for grading pig carcases in Ireland (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 April 1998 amending Decision 87/293/EEC authorising methods for grading pig carcases in Ireland (Only the English text is authentic) (98/284/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 87/293/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. The formula under point 3 of Part 1 of Annex I is replaced by the following:
'^y = 60,91 - 0,839 x1+ 0,150 x2`.
2. The formula under point 3 of Part 2 of Annex I is replaced by the following:
'^y = 60,30 - 0,847 x1+ 0,147 x2`.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 April 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 301, 20. 11. 1984, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 320, 22. 12. 1993, p. 5.
(3) OJ L 146, 6. 6. 1987, p. 66.
(4) OJ L 159, 28. 6. 1994, p. 61.
